info.name: Catalog Postman Collection - Production
info.description: This bundle provides APIs for managing and retrieving product information, including searching for medicines, viewing product details, exploring categories, and requesting products. It helps to smooth the product catalog management.

formdata.description: Stringified array of medicine_ids, contain at l;east 2 ids, optional

response.name: view
response.body:
{ "status_code": "1", "status_message": "Success", "datetime": "2022-11-30 11:28:53", "data": { "content": "Losartan (50mg)", "how_medicine_works": "Ltk 50 Tablet is an angiotensin receptor blocker (ARB). It relaxes blood vessel by blocking the action of a chemical that usually makes blood vessels tighter. This lowers the blood pressure, allowing the blood to flow more smoothly to different organs and the heart to pump more efficiently.", "how_to_use": "Take this medicine in the dose and duration as advised by your doctor. Swallow it as a whole. Do not chew, crush or break it. Ltk 50 Tablet may be taken with or without food, but it is better to take it at a fixed time.", "id": "ZnsQl586DmR/ANT3aLdM4g==", "medicine_image": "", "is_rx_required": 1, "dosage_type": "tablet", "medicine_name": "Ltk 50 Tablet", "mrp": 23.5, "packing_size": "10 tablets in 1 strip", "size": 10, "manufacturer_name": "Unison Pharmaceuticals Pvt Ltd", "side_effects": " Common Dizziness Back pain Sinus inflammation Increased potassium level in blood ", "alcohol": "Taking Losartan with alcohol may excessively lower the blood pressure.", "driving": "It is not known whether Ltk 50 Tablet alters the ability to drive. Do not drive if you experience any symptoms that affect your ability to concentrate and react.", "kidney": "Ltk 50 Tablet is safe to use in patients with kidney disease. No dose adjustment of Ltk 50 Tablet is recommended.
However, talk to your doctor if you have any underlying kidney disease. Regular monitoring of blood pressure is recommended for better dose adjustment.", "lactation": "Ltk 50 Tablet is probably safe to use during lactation. Limited human data suggests that the drug does not represent a significant risk to the baby.", "liver": "Ltk 50 Tablet should be used with caution in patients with liver disease. Dose adjustment of Ltk 50 Tablet may be needed. Please consult your doctor.
Use of Ltk 50 Tablet is not recommended in patients with severe liver disease.", "pregnancy": "Ltk 50 Tablet is unsafe to use during pregnancy.
There is positive evidence of human fetal risk, but the benefits from use in pregnant women may be acceptable despite the risk, for example in life-threatening situations. Please consult your doctor.", "medicine_category": "generic", "alternative_results": { "in_stock_count": 0, "results": [] }, "medicine_images": [ { "id": 96, "medicine_image": "https://d1tu4pmhr82np8.cloudfront.net/storage/medicines/611cb05d49e3d.jpg", "medicine_id": 73861, "default": "no" }, { "id": 99, "medicine_image": "https://d1tu4pmhr82np8.cloudfront.net/storage/medicines/611cb1e1ee996.jpg", "medicine_id": 73861, "default": "no" }, { "id": 108, "medicine_image": "https://d1tu4pmhr82np8.cloudfront.net/storage/medicines/611ccc345338b.jpg", "medicine_id": 73861, "default": "no" }, { "id": 49, "medicine_image": "https://d1tu4pmhr82np8.cloudfront.net/storage/medicines/611b81f100258.jpeg", "medicine_id": 73861, "default": "no" }, { "id": 50, "medicine_image": "https://d1tu4pmhr82np8.cloudfront.net/storage/medicines/611b81fdcbc59.jpeg", "medicine_id": 73861, "default": "no" }, { "id": 52, "medicine_image": "https://d1tu4pmhr82np8.cloudfront.net/storage/medicines/611b81fe85433.jpeg", "medicine_id": 73861, "default": "no" } ] } }

formdata.description: Content (in the medicine) to be searched
Product's Packaging | strip, bottle, packet, piece, tube, etc...
Category of the medicine like otc, generic, FMCG, cosmetic, etc...
Unit of the medicine in gm, ml, tablets, capsules, etc...
Default: '' (blank) | Min len: 3 char | Max len: 20 char
Default: '' (blank) | Min len: 3 char | Max len: 20 char
